articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Fails to Enter Its Orbit
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Fails to Enter Its Orbit 
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK launched its first application satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 at the Sohae Satellite Launching Station in Cholsan County, North Phyongan Province at 07:38:55 a.m. on Friday.
					 The earth observation satellite failed to enter its preset orbit.
					
					 Scientists, technicians and experts are now looking into the cause of the failure.

articles.title: DPRK Holds Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as Eternal WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
DPRK Holds Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as Eternal WPK General Secretary
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea in its 4th Conference Wednesday adopted a decision to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal general secretary.
					 The news has given great pleasure to the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 A secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Myong Son Yong, told KCNA:
					
					 The WPK is an ever-victorious party, which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il. Since its birth, the Party has creditably guided the army and the people with no mistake in its lines.
					
					 With Kim Jong Il held in high esteem as the eternal general secretary, the WPK can further glorify its dignity as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A secretary of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Culture, Jo Min Je, said:
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the Korean people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal WPK general secretary and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He successfully realized the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President, thus giving steady continuity to Kim Il Sung's history.
					
					 In particular, he developed the WPK into the great party leading the building of Korean-style socialism to victory under the Songun (military-first) politics.
					
					 Servicepersons and civilians will convey, through generations, the undying feats he performed by laying a sure guarantee for the accomplishment of the cause of Juche and the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Kwak Song Su, secretary of the Party Committee of the Pyongyang Rubber Factory, evinced the determination to glorify Kim Jong Il's noble life, stressing that the title of WPK general secretary can be attached only to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Head of WPK Hailed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Head of WPK Hailed
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Ministry of Light Industry of the DPRK are delighted at the happy news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was elected first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Vice-Minister Choe Il Ryong told KCNA:
					
					  "The dear respected Kim Jong Un is a prominent great man faithfully carrying forward the idea and cause of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Guided by him, our revolution is progressing steadily and confidently along the road shown by the leader."
					
					 A department director, Ho Chol San, said Kim Jong Un is a great statesman giving energetic and wise guidance over the party, army and state affairs as a whole.
					
					 A department director, Kim Kyong Suk, said,
					
					 "Kim Jong Un is the tender-hearted leader of the people as he takes warm care of all of them with deep love.
					
					 With the noble outlook on the people, he makes a new history of love for people, attaching top priority to the interests and convenience of the people."

articles.title: Korean People Hold Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as Eternal NDC Chairman
articles.content:
Korean People Hold Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as Eternal NDC Chairman
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The fifth session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK decided to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK. The session took place at a time when the DPRK entered the new century in the history of the sun's Korea. 
					The session modified and supplemented "Socialist Constitution of the DPRK" in such a way that Kim Jong Il will be held as eternal chairman of the NDC. The session solemnly declared that it was adopted as an ordinance of the Supreme People's Assembly in reflection of the ardent desire and will of the whole party and army and all the people. Kim Jong Il established the state political system for comprehensively embodying the Songun politics in the revolution and construction when the Korean revolution was undergoing the worst difficulties and put the DPRK's political and military might on the top phase, thereby opening a great heyday of building a thriving socialist nation unprecedented in the 5,000-year history of the nation.
					
					 All the participants broke into rousing cheers of "Hurrah!" in excitement and pleasure of holding the great sun of Songun in high esteem forever along with the prospering DPRK. 
					
					 It is the biggest honor and greatest dignity of the sun's Korea which would shine along with the new era of Juche revolution, the Songun era provided by Kim Jong Il that he, a great brilliant commander of Songun, a peerlessly elder statesman and great sage of the revolution recognized and praised by the world, is held in high esteem for all ages at the top post of the NDC which symbolizes and represents the glory of the country and the dignity of the nation. 
					
					 That he is held in high esteem as the eternal leader of our revolution is an expression of the deepest reverence and praise for the legendary great man who firmly defended the Songun tradition of the Korean revolution with his outstanding Songun idea and revolutionary leadership, guaranteed the ever-victorious future of Kim Il Sung's Korea by further developing the DPRK government into a powerful political weapon for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and made great contributions to national reunification and global independence. 
					
					 By holding Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages at the top post of the DPRK, the Korean people have become able to glorify his outstanding exploits in the Songun revolutionary leadership for all ages along with the eternal history of the sun's Korea. It also made it possible for the DPRK to always demonstrate its dignity as the country of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The session fully displayed all over the world the strong will and noble moral obligation of the army and people of the DPRK to regard the exploits performed in the Songun revolution by Kim Jong Il, who devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche till the last moments of his sacred life, as the precious wealth of the party and the revolution and eternal guidelines. They are full of resolve to unite close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of Songun revolution that was started and has developed with arms, and turn the idea of Kim Jong Il into reality. 
					
					 They are full of great national pride in having him forever at the top post of the party and state. They will dynamically advance along the road of Songun revolution for eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea that shines with the sacred and august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Elected First Chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Elected First Chairman of NDC of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The fifth session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK elected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the party and people of the DPRK, as first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK. The session was convened at a historic time when a bright future is being opened for the great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					 The session solemnly declared at home and abroad that Kim Jong Un was elected as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK in reflection of the unanimous desire of servicepersons and people of the country. Kim Jong Un, a great statesman of literary and military accomplishments, who is possessed of outstanding wisdom, distinguished leadership ability, matchless pluck and noble revolutionary comradeship, is advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il along the path of victory with his sweeping revolutionary practice.
					
					 The participants burst into rousing cheers of "Hurrah!" with feelings of strong yearning and loyalty, extending highest glory and warmest congratulations to him.
					
					 His election as first chairman of the NDC is an auspicious event that provides an eternal guarantee for glorifying Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses by consolidating the DPRK as the country of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and demonstrating the dignity and might of the nation.
					
					 This is a manifestation of the unshakable will of all the servicepersons and people to follow the supreme commander who has performed great exploits in political, military, economic, cultural and all other fields by providing energetic leadership to the revolution and construction together with Kim Jong Il from long ago.
					
					 This is also a historic event that demonstrated the strong will of the army and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the center of unity and leadership and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, Songun revolutionary cause that was started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 All the participants were full of pledge to become genuine revolutionary comrades and comrades-in-arms who would go along the path of the revolution arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder with Kim Jong Un while single-mindedly united around him under the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by great Comrade Kim Jong Un!"
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the army and people who are dynamically advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, closely rallied around him.

articles.title: Fifth Session of 12th SPA Held
articles.content:
Fifth Session of 12th SPA Held
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The fifth session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 Present there were Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the WPK and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 Deputies to the SPA were present.
					
					 Officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions and those in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media attended the session as observers.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Decisions were made on following agenda items at the session:
					
					 1. On revising and supplementing the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK
					
					 2. On electing the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to top post of the DPRK
					
					 3. On the work of the Cabinet of the DPRK for Juche 100 (2011) and tasks for Juche 101 (2012)
					
					 4. On the results of the implementation of the state budget of the DPRK for Juche 100 (2011) and on the state budget for Juche 101 (2012) 
					
					5. Organizational matter
					
					 The first agenda item was discussed at the session.
					
					 Deputy Yang Hyong Sop made a report on revising and supplementing the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK.
					
					 Ordinance of the SPA of the DPRK "On approving the proposal for revising and supplementing the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK" was adopted with unanimous approval.
					
					 The second agenda item was discussed at the meeting.
					
					 Deputy Kim Yong Nam, president of the SPA Presidium made a speech recommending the dear respected Kim Jong Un to the top post of the DPRK.
					
					 He courteously proposed to the Supreme People's Assembly the proposal of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK on electing the dear respected Kim Jong Un as first chairman of the National Defence Commission, in reflection of the unanimous will of the party, the army and the people.
					
					 The proposal was fully supported and approved by all the deputies and the participants as it reflected the ardent desire and unanimous will of all the party members, servicepersons and other people.
					
					 The session solemnly declared that Kim Jong Un has been elected as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants broke into rousing cheers of "Hurrah!" looking up to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Deputy Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, made a report on the third agenda item.
					
					 He said that last year the gross industrial output value grew 2 percent and the production of electricity generated at hydraulic power stations, iron ore, electrolytic zinc, power generators, fertilizers and magnesia clinker showed a remarkable growth over the previous year.
					
					 This year the Cabinet will concentrate all efforts on light industry and agriculture and exert utmost efforts for laying a solid foundation for building an economic power in warm response to the flames of the industrial revolution in the new century and the flames kindled in South Hamgyong Province, ensuring the combat preparations of the People's Army and providing a material guarantee for the development of the national defence industry, he stressed.
					
					 Deputy Choe Kwang Jin, minister of Finance, made a report on the fourth agenda item.
					
					 He said that last year the state budgetary revenue was over-fulfilled 1.1 percent, of which the plan for local budgetary revenue was over-fulfilled 12.8 percent. He said that the state budgetary expenditure was implemented at 99.8 percent and 15. 8 percent of the total state budgetary expenditure was allocated as defence spending.
					
					 He said that the plan for state budgetary revenue is expected to grow 8.7 percent and the plan for state budgetary expenditure 10.1 percent over last year. He pointed out that 15.8 percent of the total state budgetary expenditure is to be spent for national defence and a large amount of educational aid fund and stipends will be sent for the children of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Written speeches were made by deputies on the third and fourth agenda items.
					
					 The speakers said that it is the greatest pleasure and honor of the army and people of the DPRK that Kim Jong Un was elected to the top post of the DPRK.
					
					 They noted that the work of the Cabinet and the implementation of the state budget were correctly reviewed and summed up and the tasks for the Cabinet were clearly set forth for stepping up the building of a thriving nation and that the state budget was correctly shaped in the direction of giving play to the advantages of the socialist system. They voiced full support and approval for them.
					
					 Decision of the SPA of the DPRK "On approving the report of work of the DPRK Cabinet and the results of the implementation of the state budget for Juche 100 (2011)" and ordinance of the SPA of the DPRK "On state budget for Juche 101 (2012) of the DPRK" were adopted with the approval by all the deputies. 
					
					 Organizational matter was discussed.
					
					 At the proposal of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, Deputies Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong and Ri Myong Su were elected members of the NDC to fill vacancies.
					
					 Deputy Kim Yong Nam announced the members of the NDC elected at the first and fifth Sessions of the 12th SPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK NDC
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK NDC
					
					 NDC Vice-Chairmen--Deputies Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Mu, Jang Song Thaek and O Kuk Ryol.
					
					 NDC Members--Deputies Pak To Chun, Kim Jong Gak, Ju Kyu Chang, Paek Se Bong, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong and Ri Myong Su.
					
					 Deputy Thae Hyong Chol was elected as secretary general of the SPA Presidium to fill a vacancy.
					
					 Deputies Ri Sung Ho and Ri Chol Man were named as vice-premiers of the Cabinet and Kim In Sik as vice-premier and chairman of the Capital Construction Commission.
					
					Deputy Pak Thae Dok, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Deputy Jon Kyong Nam, president of University of National Economics, were elected as members of the Legislation Committee of the SPA to fill vacancies.

articles.title: SPA Session on Work of Cabinet Last Year and Its Tasks for This year
articles.content:
SPA Session on Work of Cabinet Last Year and Its Tasks for This year
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Deputy Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, made a report on the work of the Cabinet last year and its tasks for this year at the 5th session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly held on Friday.
					 He said that 2011 was the year of a historic turn in which fresh changes were brought about in building a thriving nation under the energetic Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il. It was, at the same time, an unforgettable year in which the army and people of the DPRK displayed the noble sense of moral obligation and the great traits of single-minded unity at the highest level by deeply mourning the death of leader Kim Jong Il and missing him very much after his untimely and sorrowful demise. 
					
					 Choe Yong Rim went on to say:
					
					 Last year the gross industrial output value grew 2 percent and the electricity produced at hydraulic power stations, iron ore, electrolytic zinc, power generators, fertilizers, magnesia clinker, etc. showed a remarkable growth over the previous year.
					
					 The modern Taedonggang Combined Fruit Processing Factory was built and lots of foodstuff factories, textile mills and daily necessities factories were technologically updated and the modernization of local industrial factories was pushed forward in provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 The second-phase Kwaksan Tideland Project was completed and many projects for irrigation set-ups were carried out and modern stock-breeding and fruit production bases technologically updated.
					
					 The construction of the Huichon Power Station was completed in a matter of three years and a lot of power station projects were wound up. Key coal mines were adjusted and reinforced to consolidate the country's fuel and power bases.
					
					 In the metal industrial field, the Juche iron production system was further improved and the technological updating of major production processes at iron and steel works made brisk headway. Nonferrous metal production bases including Tanchon area was modernized.
					
					 Raw materials bases for light industry were adjusted and reinforced. The Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex were technologically updated.
					
					 The modernization of key factories in the fields of machine-building and electronic industries was pushed forward. The fuel pump branch plant of the Huichon Precision Machine Plant was updated at a cutting-edge level.
					
					 The People's Theatre, high-rise apartment buildings and other edifices have been constructed in the Mansudae area in Pyongyang. Amazing streets and villages suitable for features of socialism have appeared in different parts of the country and Tanchon Port was successfully built.
					
					 This year the Cabinet will concentrate all efforts on light industry and agriculture and lay a solid foundation for building an economic power in warm response to the flames of industrial revolution in the new century and the flames kindled in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 It is the most important target of the struggle set by the WPK for this year to bring about a signal improvement in the people's standard of living.
					
					 The light industrial field should operate the light industrial factories, local industrial factories and daily necessities production bases at full capacity and increase the production of varieties of quality consumer goods which are liked by the people and cater to their tastes and supply them to the people, while directing utmost efforts to making modern light industrial bases pay off.
					
					 In the agricultural field, the per hectare grain yield should be remarkably raised on all farms as required by the WPK's policy on bringing about a drastic boost in agricultural production and as required by the Juche-farming methods and a cyclic production system be established to boost production at modern stock-breeding bases and fruit production bases so as to make the people benefit from them.
					
					 In the chemical industrial field, the production should be kept going at a high rate at the factories and enterprises which had been technologically updated in recent years to ensure a satisfactory supply of chemical fertilizers and agricultural chemicals. The production of chemical fiber and synthetic resin should be raised to drastically increase the proportion of locally available raw materials for light industry, and production be boosted at factories and enterprises in Tanchon area.
					
					 The production of electricity, coal and iron and steel should be increased to the maximum and the strain on railway transport be eased. 
					
					 While making primary efforts for construction related to the people's living, the major construction projects and the work to turn Pyongyang into world-class city and build provincial seats and other cities in a peculiar way should be stepped up in a planned way. At the same time, the work for protecting land and preserving environment and the city management should be significantly improved to face-lift the country.
					
					 Exports production bases should be built under a long-term plan and the development of economic and trade zones and joint venture and contracts be vigorously undertaken and the technological cooperation in economy with other countries be boosted.
					
					 Centers for training talents and schools at all levels should be built well, educational contents and methods be improved to meet the requirements of the developing situation and the advantages of the socialist public health system be given full play in the public health field.
					
					 In the field of literature and arts, more revolutionary and appealing works which reflect the spirit of the times should be created. In the sports field, a hot sports wind should prevail throughout the country to put sports technique on a higher level and fully demonstrate the nation's dignity and spirit at international games.
					
					 Utmost efforts shall be directed to ensuring the combat preparations of the People's Army and providing a material guarantee for the development of national defence industry.
					
					 The reporter called on the officials in the field of economic guidance to conduct all the work in a creative and revolutionary manner, share weal and woe with the masses in the stirring practice and work hard to meet their interests and provide the best conveniences to them.

articles.title: Results of Implementation of State Budget Last Year and State Budget for This Year
articles.content:
Results of Implementation of State Budget Last Year and State Budget for This Year
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Deputy Choe Kwang Jin, minister of Finance, made a report on the results of the implementation of the state budget last year and state budget for this year at the 5th session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Friday.
					 He said that last year the state budgetary revenue was over-fulfilled 1.1 percent, of which the local budgetary revenue over-fulfilled 12.8 percent and the state budgetary expenditure was implemented at 99.8 percent.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 The state allocated huge funds of its budgetary expenditure for the development of national economy, thus financially backing the work to put the major industrial fields including light industry, agriculture and four vanguard fields of the national economy on a Juche and modern basis, boost production and build grand edifices to be presented to the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The state made a satisfactory budgetary allocation for enforcing popular policies and social and cultural policies, a key indication of the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK, contributing to the enforcement of social measures such as the universal compulsory free education, free medical care, social insurance, social security and rest at sanatoria and rest homes and the rapid development of sports and culture in the Songun era.
					
					 15.8 percent of the total state budgetary expenditure was allocated as defence spending.
					
					 The scale of revenue and expenditure of the state budget for this year was shaped in such a way as to provide a financial guarantee for an all-out offensive for carrying out the WPK's strategy for building a thriving nation as required by the grand general march to be made at a time when a new century of Kim Il Sung's Korea starts.
					
					 The plan for state budgetary revenue is expected to increase 8.7 percent, of which the transaction tax, a key source of the budgetary revenue, is expected to grow 7.5 percent, the revenue from the profits of state enterprises to go up 10.7 percent, the revenue from the profits of cooperative enterprises 5.3 percent, the revenue from the fixed asset depreciation 2.3 percent, the revenue from real estate rent 1.9 percent and that from social insurance 1.7 percent over last year.
					
					 The plan for state budgetary expenditure is expected to grow 10.1 percent, of which the expenditure for light industry and agriculture 9.4 percent, that for power, coal and metal industries and railway transport 12.1 percent, that for capital construction 12.2 percent, that for development of science and technology 10.9 percent, that for education 9.2 percent, that for public health 8.9 percent, that for social insurance and social security 7 percent, that for sports 6.9 percent and that for culture 6.8 percent over last year.
					
					 15. 8 percent of the total state budgetary expenditure will be spent for national defence and a large amount of educational aid fund and stipends will be sent for the children of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need for all the units and fields of the national economy to conduct a vigorous drive for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology in response to the flames of industrial revolution in the new century, the flames kindled in South Hamgyong Province and thus bring about a steady surge in production and construction. He also called for thoroughly carrying out the WPK's policy on increasing production and economizing to the maximum and implementing without fail monthly and quarterly plans for state budgetary revenue.
					
					 Tasks for this year are huge but victory is in store for the Korean people as long as there are the wise guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the powerful foundation of self-supporting economy laid by leader Kim Jong Il and the inexhaustible mental power of the single-mindedly united army and people, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected on Mansu Hill
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected on Mansu Hill
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were successfully built on Mansu Hill.
					 The statues portray smiling Kim Il Sung who indicates the way ahead with his hand held forward and smiling Kim Jong Il blessing Songun Korea prosperous morrow while looking far into its bright future in the new century.
					
					 Large sculptures on both sides of the statues have been renovated on the highest level.
					
					 The unveiling ceremony took place with splendor Friday.
					
					 There were huge crowds of people from all walks of life, servicepersons, youth and students, 300 000 in all, on Mansu Hill and nearby streets. They were holding bouquets and balloons.
					
					 Supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the opening ceremony.
					
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials, chairpersons of friendly parties.
					
					 Also on hand were delegates to the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of the President, creators, officials and employees of the Mansudae Art Studio, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, anti-Japanese patriotic martyrs, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, heroes, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, men of merits and working people in the city.
					
					 Also present there were a delegation of the Koreans in Japan and delegations of overseas compatriots and overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests who are participating in the World Congress on the Juche Idea, the international festival and the April spring friendship art festival.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by senior party, state and army officials.
					
					 The moment thunderous cheers of "Hurrah!" resounded forth, fireworks were displayed and balloons were released.
					
					Laid before the statues were large floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Cabinet and in the name of all the Korean people.
					
					 Laid were floral baskets in the name of ministries, national institutions, armed forces organs, provinces, cities, counties, important units which were visited by the President and Kim Jong Il, units of the KPA and the KPISF, party and power bodies and factories, enterprises, co-op farms, universities, colleges and schools in Pyongyang and local areas. 
					
					 Floral baskets were also laid by the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here and foreign guests and overseas compatriots.
					
					 All the participants bowed to the statues.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee who is president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Un instructed to build the statue of Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill together with that of Kim Il Sung and energetically led the work to build them on the highest level in the shortest time possible.
					
					 It was possible to erect the statues on the highest level in a matter of some 100 days thanks to the yearning and devotion made by all the soldiers and people, overseas Koreans and the world progressives.
					
					 This great auspicious event is a precious fruition of the noble moral obligation of Kim Jong Un and his energetic leadership. It is also a striking manifestation of the unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages. 
					
					 The unveiling ceremony ended and fireworks were displayed again.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Korean Children in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Korean Children in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) for the democratic national education of children of Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The fund and stipends amount to 165,600,000 yen in Japanese currency.
					
					 The educational aid fund and stipends remitted by Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un to Chongryon in 158 installments so far total 46,925,050,390 yen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Uniting Closer around WPK Led by Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Uniting Closer around WPK Led by Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial says that the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation is sure to emerge victorious thanks to the leadership of the glorious Workers' Party of Korea which has the dear respected Kim Jong Un at its top post and the single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people intensely faithful to the party's cause.
					 The Fourth Conference of the WPK was a political event to be particularly recorded in the history of building the party of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 It was a historic meeting which fully demonstrated the steady continuity being given to the revolutionary cause of Juche that was started on Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the sun whom all the party members, service personnel and people of the DPRK acclaimed out of their heartfelt desire, and the banner of victory of Songun Korea. 
					
					 The basic spirit of the WPK Conference is to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il, the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who represents the center of unity and leadership.
					
					 The WPK Conference is of great significance as it provided a sure political guarantee for more actively pushing forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation by remarkably increasing the party's capability and leading role as required by the developing situation. 
					
					 Adopted with a unanimous approval at the WPK Conference was a decision to hold Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK. The title of the WPK general secretary is a sacred title symbolizing the absolute authority of Kim Jong Il who led the party along the path of victories. 
					
					 The WPK Conference also elected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the WPK. This made it possible to carry forward the history and tradition of the single-minded unity as well as the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation full of vitality. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will advance along the path of Juche revolution started on Mt. Paektu by holding Kim Jong Un at the top post of the WPK and the revolution, true to the pledge made before the bier of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Pay Floral Tribute
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Office of the World Food Programme here laid a floral basket before the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio on Friday, two days before the centenary of the birth of the President. 
					 They paid tribute to them after laying the floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Foreign Guests and Koreans in China Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Guests and Koreans in China Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and Koreans in China visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill to pay tribute to him on Friday. They were the families of Li Zade, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China; Ri Kwan Rin, China-resident Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle; Feng Zhongyun, Liu Hanxing, Wang Xiaoming and Peng Xilu, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					 They laid bouquets before the statue and paid tribute to the President. 
					
					 They arrived here on Friday. -0-

					 They were separately handed over to officials concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Pakistani Ambassador

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chief of PNA

Floral Basket  from Chief of PNA
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA), on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It was handed to an official concerned Friday by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 The ambassador also handed to an official concerned a congratulatory letter addressed to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Party and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China Thursday.
					 The letter extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as first secretary of the WPK, representing intense loyalty to him.
					
					 The letter said:
					
					 Witnessing the situation of the homeland which has steadily followed the road of victory while waging a difficult and arduous struggle unprecedented in history, the Koreans in China have keenly realized that the eternal happiness and future of the socialist country are guaranteed as it is blessed with the President, the General and the leader.
					
					 The letter evinced the will of the Koreans in China to wage a more dynamic patriotic movement for the prosperity of the country and national reunification with the pride and honor of being overseas citizens of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, with Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, at the helm of the revolution of Juche.

articles.title: Congratulations from General Secretary of Vietnamese Communist Party
articles.content:
Congratulations from General Secretary of Vietnamese Communist Party
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, on Wednesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of all the members of the Vietnamese Communist Party, extend warmest congratulations to you as regards the decision to hold Comrade Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK and your election as first secretary of the WPK at the Fourth Conference of the WPK. 
					
					 The Conference, an event of great significance for the WPK, the government and people of the DPRK, was held on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 On this significant holiday I send my warmest congratulations to you and, through you, to all the members of the WPK and the fraternal Korean people.
					
					 I believe that the WPK would register greater success in its work for socialist construction, economic development and the peaceful reunification of the country under your leadership.
					
					 I wish you good health and success in your important work. I hope that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and peoples of Vietnam and the DPRK would further develop day by day.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from Participants in International Festival
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from Participants in International Festival
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The participants in the International Festival for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung Thursday presented a letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un congratulating him on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission at its Fourth Conference.
					 His election to the top post of the WPK is an event of very important significance in building a thriving nation in the DPRK and accomplishing the human cause of independence, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 His election is an expression of absolute trust in Kim Jong Un by the WPK and the Korean people and a reflection of their unanimous hope that he would further glorify Kim Il Sung's Korea as an invincible power dignified with independence, a power that demonstrates its might by Songun.
					
					 His election provided a sure guarantee for the WPK, founded by the President and wisely led by Kim Jong Il, to give steady continuity to its victorious history and tradition, and opened a rosy future of the DPRK.
					
					 The letter expressed expectation and belief that the WPK would invariably perform a leading role in the socialist cause, human cause of independence under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme leader of the nation, on April 12 received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF).
					 It was a special, great event that the Conference of the WPK decided to hold general secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the WPK forever and elected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the WPK, the letter said. This was an expression of the absolute trust and reverence, noble loyalty and moral obligation of the people in the north towards the undying feats of the great men. 
					
					 It paid highest tribute to Kim Jong Il and extended greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un who is winning a new victory of the Juche cause and the Songun revolutionary cause through his energetic leadership, possessed of rare wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and noble virtues.
					
					 It is the highest honor and great fortune of the Korean nation that Kim Jong Un was elected to the top post of the WPK, the letter said, evincing the AINDF's determination to open up a new phase of independent reunification, true to his leadership.

articles.title: Congratulations to Malawi President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Malawi President
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Joyce Banda upon his assumption of presidency of Malawi on April 10.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Malawi would grow stronger, wishing the president success in his responsible work for the country's stability and social progress.

articles.title: Gifts from Foreign Political Parties

Gifts from Foreign Political Figures

articles.title: Members of UNDP Office Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Members of UNDP Office Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Office of the United Nations Development Programme here laid a floral basket before the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio on Friday, two days before the centenary of the birth of the President. 
					 They paid tribute to them after laying the floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Mangyongdae 
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), and its staff members visited Mangyongdae Friday, two days before the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and those of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, before paying silent tribute to them.
					
					 Then they moved to the President's old home and looked round historic relics preserved there.
					
					 The chief told KCNA:
					
					 Visiting the President's old home, I cannot repress my yearning for the President.
					
					 It is the greatest fortune of the fellow countrymen to hold the President in high esteem as the sun of the nation.
					
					 The feats the President performed for the great national unity and the country's reunification will shine forever.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas compatriots taking part in the 14th Kimilsungia Festival and the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited Mangyongdae on Friday.
					 They dropped in at the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae and looked round historic relics, being briefed on his revolutionary career and patriotic and revolutionary family members.
					
					 They posed for a photo in honor of their visit to the home before touring the historic relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 Wu Yongzhe, president of the Dandong Kwang Myong Sung Energy Research and Development Co. Ltd., said Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his early year to achieve the historic cause of the liberation of Korea.
					
					 Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun of China, said Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the people's well-being and prosperity.
					
					 He indicated the road of struggle ahead of the revolutionary people of the world and made undying contributions to global independence, he added.
					
					 The foreign guests and overseas compatriots also visited the Mansudae Art Studio Friday.

articles.title: First Day Performances of April Spring Friendship Art Festival Given
articles.content:
First Day Performances of April Spring Friendship Art Festival Given 
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- First day performances of the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given before full houses at the Ponghwa Art Theater, the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Central Youth Hall, the music hall of the Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, the Yun I Sang Concert Hall and the Pyongyang Circus Theater on Thursday.
					 Performers included art organizations and artistes from various countries such as Germany, Belarus, Austria, Italy, Finland, Mongolia, Vietnam, India, Japan, Indonesia, Armenia, Malaysia, Egypt and the U.S. 
					
					 Overseas Korean art troupes also gave performances.
					
					 The Chinese art troupe (song and dance ensemble of the Chinese People's Liberation Army) raised the curtain with immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung". It presented Korean songs "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae" and "Footsteps" and other numbers.
					
					 The Chorus of the Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory presented the immortal classic masterpiece "Nostalgia." This song made the audience feel as if they were listening to President Kim Il Sung sing the song before guerillas, nostalgic for his beloved country and Mangyongdae, his native place, by a campfire in a secret camp in the days of the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 A male soloist of the Polish group of famous actors and actresses sang in Korean "Song of Loyalty" truthfully representing the boundless reverence of the Korean people for President Kim Il Sung who liberated the country and built an independent and dignified socialist power.
					
					 The female musicians Anakaona of Cuba lyrically presented serial songs of Korea "Recollecting My Old Home," "I Think, Looking at You."
					
					 The art troupe of Koreans in Japan put on the stage female duet "Mangyongdae, the Cradle of Revolution" and mixed chorus "Song of the Leader Is Eternal" and the art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. the Fourth Movement "We Pledge" from symphony "The Leader Will Always Be with Us," mesmerizing the audience.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France put on the stage "Prelude" from opera "Carmen," the Dance Troupe of Kiev Dance Theater of Ukraine dance "Friendship" and the Appassionante Three Female Trio of Italy song "Funi Kula Funi Kula" and "Toast" from the opera "Traviata" by Verdi and other numbers.
					
					 In their presentations artistes impressively represented the deep reverence for Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Banquet Given for Participants in Int'l Festival
articles.content:
Banquet Given for Participants in Int'l Festival
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Centenary of the Birth of President Kim Il Sung Friday hosted a banquet at the People's Palace of Culture for the participants in the international festival in celebration of the centenary of his birth. 
					 Invited to the banquet were co-chairpersons of the international preparatory committee including Guy Dupre, delegations and delegates from many countries and regions and international bodies. 
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, co-chairman of the international preparatory committee and chairman of the DPRK preparatory committee, Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, vice-chairwoman of the DPRK preparatory committee, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Kim Jong Suk said in her speech that Kim Il Sung was the world's political elder who steered the 20th century with his great idea and outstanding political ability, and peerlessly great sage who attracted all people with the rays of the sun.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was the outstanding successor to the cause of Juche, the sun of the 21st century, prominent veteran statesman and benevolent father of all people, she said, and went on: 
					
					 Thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the future of human cause of independence is rosy.
					
					   She expressed belief that the participants in the festival will further vigorously conduct solidarity activities of praising the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and supporting the Korean people's efforts for building a thriving nation in the future, too. 
					
					 Guy Dupre said in his speech that Kim Il Sung was a great man in the 20th century and his great feats will shine long in the history of mankind.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The current festival made all the participants feel stronger yearning and reverence for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Korean people will as ever win victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will live forever in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives of the world.

articles.title: Performances of ASFAF Continue
articles.content:
Performances of ASFAF Continue
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is going on before full house at theatres in Pyongyang on Friday. 
					 Malaysia My Harmonica World Ensemble began the performance with the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" in boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The performers' playing of "General on a Galloping White House" reminded the audience of the strong pluck, courage and noble virtues possessed by leader Kim Jong Il, the heaven-sent great man.
					
					 The quintet of Finland lyrically sang the immortal masterpiece "Nostalgia", leading the audience to a noble world of the song.
					
					 The audience recollected with deep emotion the ardent patriotism shown by the President in the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 A male soloist of the Art Troupe of State Song and Dance Theatre of Vietnam impressively sang "Our Leader" in boundless reverence for the President.
					
					 The art troupe of Koreans in China also touched chord with the audience.
					
					 Male solo "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and song and dance "We Live under Sky over Mt. Paektu" represented the unanimous desire of Koreans in China to glorify the immoral exploits of the peerlessly great men with self-confidence of living in places associated with the revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 Through narration and chorus "We Saw the Sun" the chairperson of the General Association of Koreans in China praised with emotion the personality of Kim Jong Il, the great sun in the 21st century, as a great man.
					
					 The dancers of the Cossack Dance Troupe of Russia performed dances "Victory" and "Dance of Cossack" while those of the Female Trio "Appasionante" of Italy sang world famous songs to be acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 The performance continues.

articles.title: 14th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
14th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 14th Kimilsungia Festival was opened here with splendor in celebration of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at its venue are more than 30,000 potted Kimilsungias presented by armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, ministries, national institutions, institutions of science, education, public health and the press and many other units, soldiers of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life, school youth and children, overseas compatriots, diplomatic missions and missions of international organizations here, foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity, foreigners and members of the associations for supporting propagation of the immortal flower.
					
					 An opening ceremony was held outside the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Friday.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, officials of armed forces and power bodies, ministries, national institutions, service personnel, Pyongyang citizens and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the Indonesian government cultural delegation, Ahmed Tidjani Cisse, minister of Cultural Heritage of Guinea, and his party, Dewi Soekarno, honorary chairperson of the Association for Supporting the Propagation of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia and a member of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee of the DPRK, said in his opening address that this festival would shine as a festival of flowers in praise of the great man as it will represent the warm sincerity of the Korean people and progressive mankind for him.
					
					 I Gusti Puta Laksaguna, head of the Indonesian government cultural delegation, in a congratulatory speech said Kimilsungia has become a symbol of the ever-lasting relations of friendship between Indonesia and the DPRK since President Sukarno presented this newly-bred flower to Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: World Congress on Juche Idea Closes
articles.content:
World Congress on Juche Idea Closes
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The World Congress on the Juche Idea was closed here on April 13.
					 Speeches were made by Takao Kamakura, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Matteo Carbonelli, secretary general of the  European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, and others.
					
					 They underlined the need for the Juche idea study organizations of various countries and regions to positively conduct the solidarity movement for supporting the Songun politics.
					
					  The Workers' Party of Korea is winning victory after victory in struggle for realizing the independence of the popular masses and in the confrontation with imperialism through its Songun politics, they said.  
					
					 They stressed the need for the world progressive political parties to follow the example set by the Workers' Party of Korea in order to vigorously struggle for the victory of the cause of socialism.
					
					 The Korean people armed with the Juche idea are registering successes in economic construction, smashing the ceaseless moves of the hostile forces, they noted.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is standing in the van of the Juche cause today, they said.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un and the Pyongyang Declaration of the World Congress on the Juche Idea were adopted there.
					
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, who is secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, noted in a closing speech that the congress was an assembly praising the peerlessly great men who founded and developed in depth the great Juche idea in which boundless reverence was erupted.
					
					 The participants in the congress donated commemorative stones to the Tower of the Juche Idea that day.

articles.title: Pyongyang Declaration Adopted at World Congress on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Pyongyang Declaration Adopted at World Congress on Juche Idea
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The World Congress on the Juche Idea was held on a grand scale in Pyongyang.
					 The World Congress on the Juche Idea Pyongyang Declaration was adopted on Friday.
					
					 The declaration said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were the great leaders who illuminated the road ahead of the era of independence and made immortal contributions to global independence.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the great Juche idea with extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom and outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and led wisely the Korean revolution and global independence, thus performing immortal feats that will go down in history.
					
					 The life of President Kim Il Sung was the sacred one of the great revolutionary, the great man, who devoted himself to freedom and happiness of the people and progress and peace of humankind.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was a peerless great man who led to victory the cause of global independence with the great idea and leadership.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integrated system of idea, theory and method of Juche, continuously developed and enriched it, honorably safeguarded with the original Songun politics the gains of socialism and led the popular masses' cause of independence to victory.
					
					 Today the ideology and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are inherited brilliantly by the dear respected            Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is a great man who is as same as President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in ideological and theoretical wisdom, leadership and virtue.
					
					 The Juche Idea is an immortal banner of the progressive people.
					
					 The popular masses' struggle to build a new independent world under the banner of the Juche idea will surely win victory.
					
					 Humankind will invariably advance along the road of independence.
					
					 It is necessary to bring about a new turn in implementing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The world people who defend independence should unite to fight against imperialism and dominationism.
					
					  It is necessary to improve forms and methods of studying and disseminating the Juche idea in conformity with the requirements of developing situation, learn after experience and successes achieved by the Korean people in advancing the revolution and construction under the banner of the Juche idea and apply them in conformity with specific conditions of relevant countries.
					
					 The world progressives will fight for victory of the Juche idea in the world, concluded the declaration.

articles.title: Letter from Participants in World Congress on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Letter from Participants in World Congress on Juche Idea
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the World Congress on the Juche Idea after its successful conclusion on Friday. 
					 The progressive people of the world have learned after the Juche idea and walked along the road of independence because President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and General Secretary Kim Jong Il systematized and enriched the idea of the President, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 The Juche idea followers of the world have looked up to President Kim Il Sung and carried on its noble mission while continuously upholding the banner of Juche even under difficulties.
					
					 After the demise of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il encouraged the people and devoted his all to building Juche-oriented socialism and realizing the President's behests, spending days of devoted struggle. 
					
					 The exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who deepened and developed comprehensively the Juche idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence and turned socialist Korea into an impregnable fortress, will shine forever. 
					
					 In the DPRK everything is done, true to the instruction and will of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and his behests are being implemented thoroughly. 
					
					 Boundless respect for and trust in the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche, gets ardent in the minds of the world Juche idea followers. 
					
					 The sun of Juche will shine forever with Kim Jong Un who is most loyal to President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Servicepersons, Delighted over Kim Jong Un's Election as NDC First Chairman
articles.content:
Servicepersons, Delighted over Kim Jong Un's Election as NDC First Chairman
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was elected first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea at the Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly Friday.
					 Upon receiving the news, DPRK servicepersons are overwhelmed with great joy.
					
					 Hwang Nam, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA:
					
					 The election marks a historic event of weighty significance in developing the country and implementing the Juche-oriented Songun cause. 
					
					 With pride in having Kim Jong Un at the helm of the party, state and army, I will do my best to creditably defend the gains of the revolution.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I extend highest glory to him.
					
					 Nam Ho Chol, an officer of the KPA, said that Kim Jong Un's election as NDC first chairman gives great pleasure to all the servicepersons. It is undoubted that the KPA, guided by him, will emerge victorious in standoff with hostile forces.
					
					 Cha Song Sun, an officer of the KPA, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of the party, army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 We will put spurs to increasing the combat power with pride in having him as first chairman of NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election to WPK's Top Post Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election to WPK's Top Post Lauded
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea elected the dear respected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the WPK on April 11.
					 Choe Tung Gwang, director of the Pyongyang Natural Perfume Research Centre, told KCNA:
					
					 "It is the highest honor of all the Korean people to have Kim Jong Un at the helm of the WPK.
					
					 This is fortune given only to the Korean people, who are blessed with great leaders down through generations.
					
					 Possessed of great personality, distinguished leadership ability and noble virtues, Kim Jong Un worked together with leader Kim Jong Il from long ago in leading the Songun (military-first) revolution and has enjoyed deep trust from servicepersons and civilians.
					
					 His election as the WPK first secretary represents the people's appreciation for his undying feats."
					
					 Ri Jong Gwan, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, said:
					
					 "Deep reverence for Kim Jong Un mirrors the admiration of the army and the people for him.
					
					 He is guiding the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory with infinite loyalty to Kim Jong Il and distinguished leadership ability.
					
					 It is our belief that the party, army and state will be everlasting along with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kim Jong Un stands in the van of the revolution."

articles.title: Harbin-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Group Arrives in Wonsan
articles.content:
Harbin-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Group Arrives in Wonsan
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A Harbin-Mt. Kumgang international tourist group led by Wu Yuchu arrived in Wonsan by a chartered plane on Friday. 
					 Present at the airport to welcome the group were officials of the Kumgangsan International Tourist Agency.

articles.title: More Foreign Media Persons Arrive
articles.content:
More Foreign Media Persons Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- More foreign media persons arrived here by air on April 12 to cover the events to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Arrivals included reporters of ABC and Fox TV of the U.S., Ria-Novosti and First Channel TV of Russia, Nihon TV, TV Asahi and TBS of Japan, ARD TV of Germany, ITV NEWS of UK, ANSA of Italy, Dagens Industri of Sweden, TVE, State TV of Spain, MEDIASET, world newspaper, Sabah of Turkey, State TV of Romania, PRO PLUS of Slovenia and TVONE of Indonesia.
					
					 Reporters of Brazilian newspaper Estado de Sao Paulo arrived here on April 9, Xinhua News, People's Daily, CCTV, China Daily and Japan Asahi TV on April 10 and magazine Express and AFP of France and the International Federation of Journalists on April 11.

articles.title: Foreigners Here
articles.content:
Foreigners Here
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Delegations and figures of different countries arrived here Friday to take part in celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included a Lao delegation led by Phankham Viphavanh, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party who doubles as minister of Education and Sports, Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party. 
					
					 A Russian cultural delegation led by Alexandr Avdeyev, minister of Culture, and a delegation of the China Foreign Languages Press Publishing and Distribution Administration headed by Director Zhou Mingwei, arrived here Friday to attend the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 Arriving here on the same day to take part in the 14th Kimilsungia Festival were Elena Mazur, director of a company of the Nakhodka City Greening Office of Russia, and her party, and an Indonesian florists delegation led by Ratna Sari L.
					
					 The representative of a Huachang company of China and his party and a delegation of the Stadast International Circus Company of Netherlands also arrived earlier.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu Erected in Sinuiju
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu Erected in Sinuiju
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Mosaics portraying images of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu "Comrade Kim Il Sung, the father of the nation", "Comrade Kim Jong Il, the son of guerrillas" and "Comrade Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero" were erected in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A ceremony of unveiling the mosaics took place on Friday.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets before the mosaics in the name of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Provincial People's Committee and other units and made bows.

articles.title: Tower of Juche Idea, Monument in Era of Independence
articles.content:
Tower of Juche Idea, Monument in Era of Independence
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Tower of the Juche Idea stands on the banks of the Taedong River in Pyongyang.
					 Over the past 30 years after its erection in April Juche 71 (1982), the tower has been visited by a great large number of people, among them 480,000 foreigners.
					
					 This figure shows how ardently the world progressives follow the Juche idea.
					
					 The world people's deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung, founder of this idea, can be felt through commemorative, valuable stones donated to the tower by more than 80 countries and international organizations.
					
					 After visiting the tower, Subash Kaji Shrestha, head of the delegation of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, said the foundation of the Juche idea by the President was an epoch-making event that brought about a radical change in the development of progressive human thought and the cause for independence.
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said the Juche idea serves as guidelines to be held fast to by not only the Korean people but also the world progressives in the revolution and construction. 
					
					 Along with the Juche idea clearly showing the road ahead of the times and humankind, the tower remains a monument in the era of independence.

articles.title: DPRK Blessed with Great Events
articles.content:
DPRK Blessed with Great Events
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK people have the dear respected Kim Jong Un elected first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					 An officer of the Korean People's Army, Jo Chol Hyok, told KCNA:
					
					 I extend the highest glory and heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un in reflection of the deep reverence of all the servicepersons for him.  
					
					 The elections marked a milestone in the history of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the Songun (military-first) revolution guided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. His inspection tours of KPA units have left deep impressions on the servicepersons.
					
					 As he is wisely leading the army and the people towards independence, Songun and socialism, we are convinced of victory as ever.
					
					 U Myong Guk, a war veteran living in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, said:
					
					 "I am very happy to hear the news that Kim Jong Un was elected to the top post of the country. Now I feel like dancing all night."
					
					 Ri Song Hui, a student at Kim Il Sung University, said she would remain intensely loyal to Kim Jong Un's leadership."

articles.title: DPRK Socialist Constitution Revised and Supplemented
articles.content:
DPRK Socialist Constitution Revised and Supplemented
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Deputy Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report on the revision and supplementation of the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK at the fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly on Friday.
					 It said:
					
					 Three years have passed since leader Kim Jong Il was re-elected as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the first Session of the 12th SPA and a new section dealing with the chairmanship of the NDC was added to the Socialist Constitution and it was stipulated there that the NDC chairman is the supreme leader of the DPRK.
					
					 Last December the DPRK suffered such great loss as the passing of Kim Jong Il, the father of the nation whom the people trusted and followed as Heaven, and the Korean revolution entered into a crucial historic turning point in carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					It was thanks to Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership, personality and virtues that the grief-stricken army and people of the DPRK could turn their greatest sorrow of the nation into redoubled strength and courage.
					
					 We are now faced with a scared task to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the party and revolution and glorify his revolutionary exploits for all ages under the leadership of       Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot and guardian of socialist Korea who put the dignity and national power of the DPRK on the highest level, weathering stern trials under the banner of Songun. 
					
					 It is the noble moral obligation of the party members, service personnel and people who are soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il to hold him in high esteem as the eternal leader of the party and revolution and glorify his revolutionary exploits.
					
					 It is the most urgent task facing the state at present to revise and supplement the Socialist Constitution as unanimously desired by the service personnel and people throughout the country to provide a legal guarantee for glorifying the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the nation-building for all ages.
					
					 I would like to courteously bring up the proposal for revising and supplementing the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK for discussion at the current SPA session according to Articles 91 and 95 of the Constitution.
					
					  The above-said proposal mainly revised and supplemented the preface and the part dealing with the state machinery, preserving the system of the composition, basic contents and revolutionary principles of the Socialist Constitution provided by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The contents of the Socialist Constitution newly revised and supplemented are as follows:
					
					 Firstly, the preface of the Constitution codified the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in the nation-building.
					
					 Intensively stipulated in the preface are the undying feats performed in the nation-building by Kim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK and father of socialist Korea, and Kim Jong Il who built the DPRK into an invincible power and their distinguished personalities as the great men and reflected there are the iron faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK and Kim Jong Il as the eternal chairman of the NDC of the  DPRK.
					
					 Secondly, the part dealing with the state machinery was revised and supplemented.
					
					 The intention of the WPK to revise and supplement this part is to make sure that the title of the NDC chairman goes only by the august name of Kim Jong Il so that the revolutionary cause of Juche may be accomplished by holding him in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK as he put the dignity and the national power of the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 Proceeding from this, the proposal newly defined the post of the first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 The institution of the new post of the first chairman of the NDC is a very important issue of clarifying who is the supreme leader of the DPRK who will lead the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and providing a legal and institutional guarantee for steadfastly ensuring the unitary leadership of the leader over the overall state affairs.
					
					 The present system of the NDC is an original and scientific one established by Kim Jong Il to increase the function of national defence to the maximum as required by the Songun era and ensure the unitary leadership of the leader over the overall state affairs.
					
					 That is why the proposal stipulated that the post of the first chairman of the NDC shall be instituted on the principle of inheriting 100 percent the revolutionary essence of the NDC system established by Kim Jong Il and the first chairman of the NDC shall lead the overall state affairs including internal and external affairs as the supreme leader of the state.
					
					 The proposal revised the title of Section 2 of Chapter 6 and Articles 91, 95 and 100-105, 107, 109, 116, 147 and 156 of the Constitution in line with the institution of the new post of first chairman of the NDC.

articles.title: DPRK People, Pleased over WPK Conference's Decision
articles.content:
DPRK People, Pleased over WPK Conference's Decision
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea in its 4th Conference Wednesday approved a decision on holding leader Kim Jong Il  in high esteem as its eternal general secretary in order to further glorify his career and life.
					 Its announcement has given great pleasure to the Korean people.
					
					 Vice-Minister of Metal Industry Kim Han Il told KCNA:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man who performed undying feats for accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche by leading the WPK to victory for scores of years.
					
					 Kim Jong Il considered it to be his lifelong duty to make the WPK President Kim Il Sung's party. Under his guidance the WPK turned into the party that secured the singleness of ideology and leadership and enjoyed absolute support and trust of broad masses, with its roots taken deep into the masses.
					
					 In particular, he successfully settled the issue of continuity to the leadership, thus laying a solid foundation for the strengthening and development of the party and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 A department director of the Ministry, Kim Hwang Ho, said:
					
					 It is the strong will of the Korean people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Giving priority to military affairs, he firmly defended the country, the revolution and socialism in unprecedented adversity and turned the DPRK into a military power and a full-fledged nuclear state.
