					 The feats he performed in the efforts to lay a sound economic foundation for building of a thriving nation will be handed down through generations.

articles.title: Performance of Ukrainian Dance Troupe in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Performance of Ukrainian Dance Troupe in Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Performance by the Dance Troupe of Ukraine's Kiev Dance Theater is going on at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre in the DPRK.
					This experienced troupe is well known to Korean people as it took part in the April Spring Friendship Art Festival several times.
					
					The troupe, made up of dance stars, won gold, silver and team prizes at the past festivals.
					
					The troupe prepared "Friendship Dance" and other numbers for the current festival.
					
					Kasyanov Oleg Evgeniyevich, head of the troupe, told KCNA:
					
					"We are very pleased to attend the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					The performance given by Korean artistes at the festival opening ceremony was wonderful. It will remain long in my memory. It is my view that such performance should be shown to many people throughout the world.
					
					I wish all artistes good success at the festival for celebrating the significant Day of the Sun.
					
					We are striving to show admirable performance to the Korean people."

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Gives Premiere in Pyongyang Festival
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Gives Premiere in Pyongyang Festival
						
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Art Troupe (song and dance ensemble of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army), gave its premiere at the Ponghwa Art Theatre in Pyongyang on Thursday for the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					With high artistry, the Chinese performers lively represented Chinese people's friendly feelings towards the Korean people.
					
					A mixed chorus "Song of the Chinese People's Liberation Army" and male solo "I Love You, the Motherland" give a glimpse of the servicepersons protecting the people's security with ardent patriotism.
					
					In particular, Li Yuning in his thirties won acclamation for his excellent conduct.
					
					The performers also put on the stage Korean songs, including "Song of General Kim Il Sung", "Kimjongilia", "Footsteps" and "Arirang".
					
					The song and dance ensemble with a history of 60 years is recognized as one of the best art troupes in China, representing the national arts of present-day China. 
					
					Awarded with gold medals and Grand Prix at domestic and foreign festivals, it has made performance tours of scores of countries worldwide.
					
					After giving performance in honor of leader Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang years ago, it had a souvenir photo taken with him. 
					
					Sun Xiaohong, head of the art troupe, told KCNA:
					
					"I had the honor to meet with Kim Jong Il for several times in the past.
					
					The Chinese government has sent top-level art troupes to every April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					The Chinese artistes at the festival were deeply moved by Korean arts while singing Korean songs. This is really a grand art festival."

articles.title: Chinese Guangxi Fine Art Exhibition Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Guangxi Fine Art Exhibition Opens in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Guangxi Fine Art Exhibition, co-sponsored by the DPRK and Chinese Ministries of Culture, opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the venue were dozens of Chinese paintings, oil paintings and woodcut printings created by painters of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region of China. They showcase part of the folk fine art of the Chinese people.
					
					 The opening ceremony was held on Friday.
					
					 Attending it were Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture of the DPRK, relevant officials, fine art creators, Pyongyang citizens, the delegation of Chinese men of culture headed by Lei Wuwu, president of Guangxi Art School, Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 Han Chol expressed conviction that the exhibition would make a contribution to bringing into full bloom the DPRK-China friendship by bearing fruits as anticipated by the peoples and men of culture and arts of the two countries.
					
					 Liu Hongcai referred to a series of exchange and cooperation and achievements made in various fields including politics, economy and culture amid concern of the supreme leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Lei Wuwu said that the displayed pieces were gifts to the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, expressing belief that the cultural exchange would contribute to further deepening the friendship between the two peoples.

articles.title: Uniforms Supplied to Schoolchildren and Students in DPRK
articles.content:
Uniforms Supplied to Schoolchildren and Students in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Uniforms are being supplied to the schoolchildren and students of all primary and secondary schools, universities and colleges in the DPRK on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At all educational institutions of different levels, their branches and shops throughout the country from Pyongyang to remote northern mountain villages, villages near the Military Demarcation Line and far-flung islands, the schoolchildren and students, their parents, educators and commercial workers are rejoiced and excited to receive the new uniforms associated with the behests of leader Kim Jong Il and the warm loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The President showed such loving care at each stage of revolution with the same boundless benevolence as he provided new dresses to members of the Children's Corps in Maanshan by spending 20 won associated with so many stories in the days of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 As early as in the period of building a new country after the liberation of Korea he gave an important instruction on supplying uniforms to the students of the universities and colleges every year. In the post-war period he took a state measure for providing uniforms to the children free of charge.
					
					 Under his loving care uniforms were simultaneously supplied to the school youth and children throughout the country who accounted for one fourth of the population in 1959, an event unprecedented in history. 
					
					 In July of 1994, the last period of his great life, too, he learned about the supply of new uniforms to students at the historic consultative meeting with leading officials in the economic field and was pleased with it. 
					
					 The President's policy which called on the state to supply uniforms to the children was carried forward under the noble loving care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the children and students of all educational institutions throughout the country ranging from kindergartens to universities were provided with new dresses, school bags and things on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the President.
					
					Even in the period of the Arduous March, forced march when everything was in short supply, he paid deep attention to the issue of school uniforms. His love for them was boundless generation after generation.
					
					 The supply of new uniforms to all school youth and children on the centenary of the birth of the President is associated with the loving care of Kim Jong Il who was deeply considerate of making the happy younger generation clad well till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for the future of the country is no longer with us, but the dear respected Kim Jong Un saw to it that uniforms associated with the loving care of the leader are supplied to the students of the DPRK, true to his behest.
					
					 A large number of teachers including new teachers were provided with clothing materials so that they might get new dresses according to their favor and likings.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Cares So Much for Popular Masses
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Cares So Much for Popular Masses
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime would say that he was greatly blessed in good people.
					 He highly appreciated them for having defeated two imperialisms, U.S. and Japanese aggressor forces and worked epoch-making miracles in building the nation and for being invariably loyal to their leader.
					
					 It is only the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea who were considered to be a blessing to their leader.
					
					 In April Juche 81 (1992), a delegation of Washington Times was honored with the audience of the President in Pyongyang, when they asked him about his hobby. He told them it was his hobby to read and go among the people.
					
					 Next year, the President met a visiting delegation of the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil. At that time, the party was seized with agony over the collapse of socialism in the former Soviet Union and other East European countries.
					
					 He told them that the lesson he drew from his protracted work was: Revolutionaries, believe in the people and rely on them at all times and you shall always emerge victorious; if you are forsaken by them, you will always fail.
					
					 This represents the steadfast belief the President had in the popular masses.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by AINDF Pyongyang Chief
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by AINDF Pyongyang Chief
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The feats President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the cause of national reunification will shine for all ages.
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), said this when interviewed by KCNA on April 13 on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President.
					
					 The chief said that it is a great fortune of all the compatriots that the President is being held in high esteem as the sun of the nation.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 South Korean people are highly praising the President who worked heart and soul till the last moments of his life to provide the Korean nation with a reunified country.
					
					 Progressive publications of south Korea are giving wide publicity to the revolutionary career and undying feats of the President.
					
					 The whole of south Korea is alive with the reverence for the President.
					
					 Unthinkable are the achievements recorded in the history of reunification movement of the Korean nation without the painstaking efforts and dedication made by the President.
					
					 Standing in the van of the national reunification movement today is the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The country is sure to be reunified as Kim Jong Un is providing leadership. This is the faith enshrined in the hearts of the south Korean people.
					
					 The Korean nation will surely achieve the cause of reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (27)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (27)
						
Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in Hearts of Humankind
					
					 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, whom the Korean people had acclaimed as their leader for the first time in the nation's history of fifty centuries, passed away at the age of 82 on July 8, Juche 83 (1994).
					
					 This shocking news plunged the people throughout the world into bitter grief.
					
					 State, government and party leaders and many prominent people of different countries sent condolatory messages over his demise. The UN secretary general visited the DPRK mission to express condolences and a flag at half-mast was hoisted at the building of the UN Headquarters.
					
					 The then U.S. President Bill Clinton released a statement of condolence. 
					
					 During the mourning period (July 8-20), more than 700 press media in 120 countries dedicated special write-ups to President Kim Il Sung's demise and some 200 news agencies and radios introduced his exploits on 2,200 occasions.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea to usher in a new era of history. 
					
					 He authored more than 10,800 celebrated works, clearly showing the road ahead of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 He led the wars against the Japanese and U.S. imperialists to victory and successfully carried out the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution and the socialist revolution to build a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence and opened up broad vista for national reunification.
					
					 His greatest feat for the times and mankind was that he successfully settled the issue of giving continuity to leadership for the accomplishment of the cause of Juche.
					
					 Since the country's liberation, Kim Il Sung paid official and unofficial visits to a total of 87 countries on 54 occasions, which took 685 days.
					
					 He met a total of more than 70,000 foreigners from 136 countries all his life. 
					
					 He was awarded 180 highest orders and medals from 70 odd countries and international organizations, honorary citizenship from 30 cities and honorary professorship and doctorate from 20 reputed universities. 
					
					 The President was presented with 569,000 pieces of gifts from local people, 165,920 pieces from party, state and government leaders and people of 169 countries, overseas and south Koreans.
					
					 His statues were erected in China and Mongolia and the International Kim Il Sung Prize instituted. More than 480 streets, institutions and organizations in 100 countries were named after Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Even after his demise, the world progressives have awarded orders, medals and honorary titles to the President, honoring him with many gifts.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, the supreme incarnation of moral obligation, set an example of perpetuating the memory of the preceding leader, thus leaving Kim Il Sung forever in the hearts of the Korean people and the world people.
					
					 The idea and feats Kim Il Sung performed in the 20th century have been fully carried forward and his glorious history continues uninterruptedly along with prospering Songun (military-first) Korea.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea Formed
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea Formed
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A senior officials' meeting of the Asian and Oceanic Regional Solidarity Organizations in support of Korea's peace and reunification took place in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 Present there were senior officials of Asian and Oceanic regional solidarity organizations and political and public figures including Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Bangladesh, and Rafael Mariano, president of the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Attending it were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, and officials concerned.
					
					 At the meeting the Asian Regional Committee to Support Korea's Reunification has been merged with the Oceanic Solidarity Committee for the Peace and Reunification of Korea to form the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting the Peaceful Reunification of Korea. Its purpose was to conduct more positive solidarity activities in line with the requirements of the developing situation.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was an action programme. The honorary chairman, co-chairmen, vice-chairmen and members of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting the Peaceful Reunification of Korea and members of its joint secretariat were also announced there.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un from the above-said committee was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Intensive Actions against Jeju Naval Base Construction Urged in S.Korea
articles.content:
Intensive Actions against Jeju Naval Base Construction Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations of different circles in south Korea held the 151st action for independence, reunification and peace in Seoul on April 10 and demanded the "government" authorities stop the savage and illegal construction of a naval base on Jeju Island.
					 The organizations recalled that the Jeju islanders and peace activists have opposed the construction.
					
					 However, the "government" used such violence as taking away and detaining the protestors, they said.
					
					 They called on people from all walks of life to turn out in the intensive actions against the Jeju naval base construction as it degrades environment of the island and threatens peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Int'l Kothongryon Issues April Issue of Bulletin "Thongil"
articles.content:
Int'l Kothongryon Issues April Issue of Bulletin "Thongil"
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) issued the April issue of its bulletin "Thongil".
					 The bulletin carried photos of President Kim Il Sung meeting with heads of state of different countries including those of former Soviet Union, China and Cuba in its special column in celebration of the centenary of his birth.
					
					 It referred to the anecdotes dealing with a large number of leaders of the world including Stalin, Mao Zedong, Tito and Che Guevara who respected the President, deeply impressed by his personality. It also deals with the fact that the President promulgated the 10-point programme for the great national unity and conducted energetic activities for the unity of the whole nation and national reunification.
					
					 The bulletin introduced schools, streets and flowering plants which world progressives named after the august name of the President in deep reverence for the great man.
					
					 It also devoted much space to articles praising the life of            Kim Il Sung, benevolent father of the people, who dedicated his all to the people's happiness.
					
					 The bulletin carried a photo-illustrated account of a meeting held by Koreans in Russia to celebrate the 100th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's birth.
					
					 Seen in the bulletin were news of a joint photo exhibition in New York, the U.S., under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Central News Agency and the Associated Press of the U.S. to mark the Day of the Sun and the news of performance given by the DPRK Unhasu Orchestra in Paris, France, before full houses.

articles.title: DPRK Film Week Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK Film Week Opens in China
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) - A DPRK film week opened in Beijing on April 11 to celebrate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television of China, members of the visiting Korean film delegation and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The vice director of the Film Management Bureau of the administration said that the Sino-DPRK friendly relations have been steadily boosted and cooperation promoted substantially in various fields thanks to the deep attention and energetic activities of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Great achievements have been made in exchange and cooperation in the movie field, the vice director said, expressing belief that the current film week will contribute to helping the Chinese people have better understanding of the DPRK and consolidating the friendship between the two peoples.
					
					 Then Korean feature film "On Blue Carpet" was shown.
					
					 Other Korean films including "A Broad Bellflower", "Wheel of Happiness", "Family Blooming in Songs" and "Oh, Youth" will be shown during the film week.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Events were held by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement and in Peru and India on the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They included seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows from April 4 to 6.
					 Displayed in their venues were the works of Kim Il Sung and books and photos showing the feats performed by him.
					
					 Korean films shown included "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism, the organizational secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru and other speakers lauded the President as the sun of all people and the sun of independence who led to victory the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung said the President provided the eternal foundation for carrying out socialist cause while leading the Korean revolution for a protracted period and thus built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi lauded the President as the great father of the progressive humankind who set a model of genuine cooperation in the international relationship.

articles.title: Russian Party Wishes Korean People Success in Socialist Construction
articles.content:
Russian Party Wishes Korean People Success in Socialist Construction
						
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia in a statement on April 5 wished the Korean people fresh and good achievements in socialist construction.
					 The rapid development of the DPRK in recent years is proving in practice the victory of the great Juche idea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is hard to find such heroic people as the Korean people who are greatly contributing to the human cause of peace by relying on their own efforts.
					
					 Witnessing in joy the active dissemination of the Juche idea worldwide, we warmly support the convention of the World Congress on the Juche Idea.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the friendly Korean people who are holding in high esteem the dear respected Kim Jong Un as their supreme leader and wish them wellbeing and prosperity on the occasion of the Day of the Sun marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as the anniversary of the century.

articles.title: Pyongyang Declaration Serves as Banner of Progressive Parties: Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Pyongyang Declaration Serves as Banner of Progressive Parties: Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Pakistan issued a statement on April 7 to mark the 20th anniversary of the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".
					 The adoption of the Pyongyang Declaration injected vitality into the struggle to revive the international socialist movement, the statement said.
					
					 The situation proves the validity of the Pyongyang Declaration, it noted, adding that it is clear that to advance along the road of socialism under the banner of the Pyongyang Declaration is the way of hewing out the bright future of mankind.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, in a statement on April 5 said that to defend and triumphantly advance the socialist cause is the just cause to realize independence of the popular masses and it is the irresistible law of historical development for mankind to advance toward socialism.
					
					 Parties desiring and building socialism should strengthen mutual support and solidarity, he said, stressing that the Pyongyang Declaration is demonstrating its great vitality and serving as the banner of the progressive parties.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania will conduct all its activities regarding the idea of the Pyongyang Declaration as the guidelines, and always support and encourage the struggle of the Korean people, he noted.

articles.title: Works Published in Peru, Cambodia and Russia
articles.content:
Works Published in Peru, Cambodia and Russia
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out by the Printer Service International Publishing House of Peru and the Antri Miek Publishing House of Cambodia. His work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was published in pamphlet by the Vladivostok El-Print Publishing House of Russia.
					 The work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", published on October 2, 1995, is an undying great program for party building and activities which reviewed with pride the glorious history of the WPK which carved out a road for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and paved a road for strengthening and developing the WPK into an eternal party of the President.
					
					 The work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence," published on April 6, 2005, clarifies that Kimilsungia is the flower of the sun which symbolizes the greatness of the President who illuminated a road for the world people to advance with the sunrays of Juche and the flower in praise of the great man blooming in the hearts of humankind in the era of independence.
					
					 It also underscores the need to glorify the undying feats performed by the President by strengthening the education through Kimilsungia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, eterno Presidente del CDN de la RPDC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, eterno Presidente del CDN de la RPDC
 Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- En el V periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, convocado durante la marcha de la nueva centuria de la Corea del Sol, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue enaltecido como eterno Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Al establecer el sistema politico estatal capaz de practicar totalmente la politica de Songun en la revolucion y la construccion cuando la revolucion coreana atravesaba peores pruebas, el abrio la era de prosperidad de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista nunca vista en la historia nacional de cinco milenios situando en el plano cimero el poderio politico-militar del pais.
					
					 Segun el gran deseo y voluntad de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, la reunion  declaro con solemnidad al interior y exterior que aprobo como decreto de la APS el enaltecimiento del Dirigente como eterno Presidente del CDN de la RPDC al enmendar y suplementar la "Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC".
					
					 Todos los participantes aclamaron "!Vivas!" llenos de gran orgullo y jubilo por tener eternamente a ese gran Sol del Songun junto con la historia de prosperidad de la RPDC. 
					
					 Tener al Dirigente, politico veterano y gran sabio de la revolucion reconocido y elogiado por todo el mundo, en la jefatura del CDN, que simboliza y representa el honor de la patria y la dignidad de la nacion, es la maxima gloria y dignidad de la Corea del Sol que brillara eternamente junto con la nueva era de la revolucion jucheana, la del Songun, abierta por el gran General Insigne del Songun. 
					
					  El hecho de que el Dirigente devino eterno lider de la revolucion coreana es el testimonio de maximo respeto y elogio a el quien con la destacada idea del Songun y la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, defendio firmemente las tradiciones del Songun de la revolucion coreana, fortalecio el poder de la RPDC como poderosa arma politica para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche e hizo gran aporte a la reunificacion de la patria y la causa de la independencia del mundo garantizando el futuro victorioso de la Corea de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					  Ese acontecimiento posibilita glorificar las proezas del General Insigne del Paektu junto con la historia de la Corea del Sol y hacer brillar la patria como eterno Estado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					  La reunion manifesto a todo el mundo la ferrea conviccion y voluntad y la noble obligacion moral de todos los militares y civiles coreanos de mantener como eterno guia y precioso patrimonio del partido y la revolucion las proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien hasta el ultimo momento de su gran vida, dedico todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la patria y el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, llevar a feliz termino con las armas la misma causa, la del Songun, iniciada y triunfada con las armas, uniendose en torno al Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito de Corea, Kim Jong Un, y realizar los ideales del Dirigente. 
					
					  Enorgullecidos de tener al Dirigente en la maxima jefatura del partido y el Estado, los militares y civiles coreanos avanzaran a pasos firmes por la unica senda de la revolucion del Songun por la prosperidad perpetua de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y de Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un elegido como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un elegido como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC
 Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El V periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, convocado en el periodo historico en que se abre el futuro radiante en el avance de gran Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, eligio a Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente de nuestro partido y pueblo, como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					 En reflejo del unanime deseo de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y otros habitantes, el foro declaro solemnemente en el interior y exterior que fue elegido como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC Kim Jong Un, quien con la extraordinaria perspicacia politica, la destacada capacidad directiva, la gran audacia, la noble camaraderia y la gran practica revolucionaria conduce a la victoria la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y avanzada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Todos los participantes felicitaron calidamente a Kim Jong Un con la tronada de "!Vivas!" rindiendole la maxima gloria.
					
					  La eleccion de Kim Jong Un como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC constituye un gran jubilo de suma importancia que garantiza la base eterna para consolidar la RPDC como eterno Estado de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, exaltar la dignidad y poderio nacionales y glorificar el socialismo coreano centrado en las masas populares. 
					
					 Tambien es la expresion de la confianza de todos los militares y civiles en el Comandante Supremo quien al dirigir desde hace mucho tiempo la revolucion y la construccion junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, realizo grandes proezas en todos los aspectos como la politica, los asuntos militares, la economia y la cultura. 
					
					 Igualmente, es un evento historico que manifiesta la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares y civiles de enaltecerle como centro de la unidad y de la direccion y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu. 
					
					 Todos los participantes estaban llenos de ardiente decision de hacerse verdaderos camaradas revolucionarios y companeros de armas del Maximo Dirigente y seguir hasta el final el camino de la revolucion, uniendose en torno a el con la consigna de "!Defendamos a vida o muerte al Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el gran camarada        Kim Jong Un!"
					
					 Siempre habra victorias y glorias en el avance del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC que avanzan a pasos firmes siguiendo al Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Efectuado V periodo de sesiones de XII Legislatura de la APS
articles.content:
Efectuado V periodo de sesiones de XII Legislatura de la APS
						
 Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el V periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano y los diputados a la APS.
					
					 Tambien, participaron en calidad de observadores los funcionarios de la institucion del partido, fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios, los organos centrales y de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion.
					
					 Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 La reunion determino los siguientes puntos de la agenda:
					
					 1. Sobre la enmienda y el suplemento de la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC
					
					 2. Sobre la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo de la RPDC 
					
					 3. Sobre el balance de las labores del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el 100 (2011) de la Era Juche y las tareas para el 101 (2012) de la Era Juche
					
					 4. Sobre el balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal de la RPDC para el 100 (2011) de la Era Juche y el presupuesto estatal para el 101 (2012) de la Era Juche
					
					 5. Problema de organizacion
					
					 El informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda estuvo al cargo del diputado Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS.
					
					  Quedo aprobado unanimemente el decreto de la APS de la RPDC "Sobre la aprobacion del proyecto de enmendar y suplementar la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC".
					
					 Debatio sobre el segundo punto de la agenda.
					
					 El presidente del Presidium de la APS Kim Yong Nam pronuncio el discurso de eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el supremo puesto de la RPDC.
					
					 El presento cortesmente ante la APS la propuesta del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC de elegir al Maximo Dirigente como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC en reflejo de la unanime voluntad de todo el Partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					 La propuesta, que refleja el ferviente anhelo y la unanime voluntad de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y los soldados del EPC y el pueblo, fue aplaudida totalmente por todos los diputados y otros participantes.
					
					 El foro declaro solemnemente que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC y Comandante Supremo del EPC fue electo como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					 Todos los participantes exclamaron !vivas! hacia el Maximo Dirigente.
					
					 El diputado Choe Yong Rim, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros pronuncio el informe sobre el tercer punto de la agenda.
					
					 El se refirio a que el valor total de la produccion industrial del ano pasado se incremento en 102% al comparar con el ano pasado y se aumento considerablemente la generacion hidroelectrica y la produccion de minerales de hierro, el zinc electrolitico, los generadores, el abono y el clinker de magnesia y otros.
					
					 Enfatizo que este ano, el Consejo de Ministros concentrara las fuerzas en la rama de la industria ligera y agricola, en preparar la firme base de la potencia economica enarbolando las llamas de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo, la de Hamnam y prestara maximas fuerzas a asegurar el suministro sustancial necesario a los preparativos de combate del EPC y al desarrollo de la industria para la defensa  nacional.
					
					 El informe sobre el cuarto punto de agenda estuvo a cargo del diputado Choe Kwang Jin, ministro de Finanzas.
					
					 El menciono que el ingreso del presupuesto estatal se cumplio con 101.1 por ciento, de entre el del presupuesto local con 112.8 por ciento y el egreso del presupuesto estatal se ejecuto con 99.8 por ciento y el 15.8% del desembolso total de presupuesto estatal  fue destinado al gasto para la defensa nacional.
					
					 Este ano, el plan de ingresos del presupuesto estatal se aumentara 8.7% en comparacion con el ano pasado, el plan de egresos del presupuesto estatal, 10.1% con respecto al ano pasado.
					
					 Y se destinara el 15.8% del egreso total del presupuesto estatal al gasto para la defensa nacional y se enviara mucho dinero como subsidios escolares y becas para los hijos de los coreanos residentes en Japon, apunto.
					
					 Hubo las intervenciones por escrito sobre el tercer y cuarto puntos de agenda.
					
					 Los oradores enfatizaron que la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo de la RPDC es una gran alegria y gloria para el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					 Senalaron que hicieron correctamente el balance  sobre las labores del CM y la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal para el ano pasado, se presentaron claramente las tareas del CM para este ano y se establecio justamente el presupuesto estatal con vistas a poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del regimen  socialista de nuestro pais. 
					
					 En la ocasion fueron aprobados por unanimidad  de los diputados la resolucion de la APS de la RPDC "Sobre la aprobacion del informe de las labores del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y del balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal para el 100 (2011) de la Era Juche" y el decreto de la APS de la RPDC "Sobre el presupuesto estatal de la RPDC para el 101 (2012) de la Era Juche". 
					
					 Discutio el problema de organizacion.
					
					 Segun la propuesta del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC, los diputados Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong y Ri Myong Su fueron elegidos de modo suplementario como miembros del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					 El diputado Kim Yong Nam dio a conocer los miembros del CDN electos en I y V periodos de sesiones de XII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC:
					
					 El camarada Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC
					
					 El camarada Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC
					
					 Los vicepresidentes: los diputados Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Mu, Jang Song Thaek y O Kuk Ryol
					
					 Los miembros: los diputados Pak To Chun, Kim Jong Gak, Ju Kyu Chang, Paek Se Bong, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong y Ri Myong Su
					
					 El diputado Thae Hyong Chol fue elegido como secretario del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC
					
					 Los diputados Ri Sung Ho y Ri Chol Man fueron nombrados como vicepremieres de la RPDC, y Kim In Sik como vicepremier y presidente de la construccion de la capital.
					
					 El diputado Pak Thae Dok, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, y el diputado Jon Kyong Nam, rector de la Universidad de Economia Nacional, fueron electos de modo suplementario como miembros de la Comision de Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim presenta informe sobre trabajo de Consejo de Ministros
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim presenta informe sobre trabajo de Consejo de Ministros
 Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- En el V periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que tuvo lugar el dia 13, el diputado Choe Yong Rim, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, presento el informe sobre el balance del trabajo del Consejo de Ministros en el ano pasado y las tareas para el ano en curso. 
					 2011 fue un ano de trascendencia historica en que se registraron nuevos cambios en la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la energica guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, comenzo el premier y prosiguio:
					
					 En ese ano inolvidable, perdimos tan inesperada y lamentablemente al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y nuestros militares y civiles realizaron actos de condolencias dando testimonios de la gran anoranza a nuestro fallecido lider, la noble obligacion moral y la unidad monolitica.
					
					 El ano pasado, se ha aumentado a 102 por ciento en comparacion con el ano 2010 el producto bruto industrial y crecio considerablemente la produccion de hidroelectricidad, minerales de hierro, zinc electrolitico, generadores, abonos, clinker de magnesia, etc. 
					
					 Se construyo el Combinado de Procesamiento de Frutas Taedonggang y se llevo a cabo la modernizacion tecnologica de muchas fabricas de alimentos, las textiles y las de articulos de uso diario y de las fabricas de industria local de las provincias, ciudades y distritos. 
					
					 Quedaron terminadas la roturacion de segunda etapa de las marismas Kwaksan, la obra de numerosos establecimientos de riego y la modernizacion de las bases ganaderas y fruticolas. 
					
					 La Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon fue inaugurada a los 3 anos desde el inicio de la construccion, ademas de otras plantas hidroelectricas.
					
					 Se realizaron el ordenamiento y el reforzamiento de importantes minas de carbon, gracias a lo cual se ampliaron las bases productivas de combustibles y energias del pais. 
					
					 En la rama de industria metalurgica, perfeccionaron el sistema de produccion del Hierro Juche, impulsaron la renovacion tecnica de los importantes procesos productivos de las fundiciones de hierro y acerias y modernizaron las bases de produccion de metales no ferrosos como las de la zona de Tanchon. 
					
					 Se realizo la renovacion tecnica en el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung, de modo que se afianzaran las bases de suministro de materias primas de la industria ligera. 
					
					 Se ha reconstruido en el nivel sofisticado la fabrica filial de bombas de combustible de la Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Huichon e impulsado energicamente la modernizacion de las importantes fabricas de industrias mecanica y electronica. 
					
					 En la zona de Mansudae de esta capital, se levantaron el Teatro del Pueblo, los rascacielos y otras creaciones monumentales, aparecieron por doquier del pais las avenidas y aldeas convertidas en un paraiso socialista y termino con exito la obra del Puerto de Tanchon. 
					
					 Este ano, el Consejo de Ministros se concentrara en la industria ligera y la agricultura y asentara la firme base de potencia economica avivando las llamas de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo, las de Hamnam (provincia de Hamgyong del Sur).
					
					 Registrar los acontecimientos relevantes en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo es la mas importante meta del Partido del Trabajo de Corea para este ano. 
					
					 En la rama de industria ligera, se debe prestar mayor atencion a la operacion eficiente de las modernas bases de industria ligera y poner en pleno funcionamiento las otras y las de industria local y las bases de produccion de articulos de primera necesidad para que produzcan mucho mas productos de consumo, que convengan al gusto del pueblo y tengan la aceptacion popular, y los suministren a los habitantes. 
					
					 La rama de agricultura debe elevar el rendimiento por hectarea de cereales de acuerdo con los metodos de cultivo jucheanos y la orientacion del partido de producir una revolucion en la agricultura y aumentar la produccion en las modernas bases ganaderas y las fruticolas mediante el establecimiento del sistema de produccion circular para que los habitantes se beneficien realmente de ellas. 
					
					 En el sector de industria quimica deben producir y suministrar suficientemente los abonos quimicos y productos agroquimicos mediante la normalizacion en alto nivel de la produccion en las fabricas y empresas reconstruidas en los ultimos anos, elevar decisivamente el porcentaje de materias primas nacionales aumentando la produccion de fibras quimicas y resinas sinteticas e incrementar la produccion de las fabricas y empresas de la zona de Tanchon. 
					
					 Hay que aumentar al maximo la produccion de la electricidad, el carbon y los materiales de hierro y acero y resolver el problema de congestion del transporte ferroviario. 
					
					 Se debe prestar la atencion primordial a la construccion para mejorar las condiciones de vida del pueblo y promover de manera planificada las labores para acondicionar Pyongyang como una ciudad de talla mundial y construir originalmente las otras ciudades incluso las capitales provinciales.
					
					 Al mismo tiempo, es preciso mejorar decisivamente la proteccion territorial y medioambiental y el urbanismo para renovar la fisonomia del pais. 
					
					 Resulta imperioso acondicionar con vistas al futuro las bases de produccion de articulos de exportacion, activar el desarrollo de las zonas economicas y comerciales y aumentar el numero de empresas asociadas y mixtas y fomentar la cooperacion economica y tecnica con otros paises. 
					
					 Se debe acondicionar bien los planteles docentes de formacion de cerebros y las escuelas a todos niveles, mejorar el contenido y los metodos de educacion y poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del sistema de salud publica socialista. 
					
					 En el campo de literatura y arte, deben crear mucho mas obras de caracter revolucionario que reflejen el espiritu de la epoca actual, y en el dominio deportivo, deben levantar la oleada deportiva en todo el pais para elevar el nivel tecnico de la rama y exaltar en las competencias internacionales la dignidad y el impetu de la nacion. 
					
					 Se dara prioridad al fortalecimiento de la combatividad del ejercito popular y al suministro de materiales necesarios al desarrollo de la industria de defensa nacional. 
					
					 Los funcionarios dirigentes de la economia deben realizar todos los trabajos de manera creativa y revolucionaria, compartir en los mismos centros de trabajo las buenas y las malas con las masas trabajadoras y laborar infatigablemente por asegurarles al maximo sus intereses y confort.

articles.title: Choe Kwang Jin balancea ejecucion del presupuesto estatal de 2011
articles.content:
Choe Kwang Jin balancea ejecucion del presupuesto estatal de 2011
 Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- En el V periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que tuvo lugar el dia 13, el diputado Choe Kwang Jin, ministro de Finanzas, presento el informe sobre el balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal para 2011 y sobre el presupuesto estatal para 2012.
					 Segun el informe, el ingreso del presupuesto estatal del ano pasado marco 101.1 por ciento y el del presupuesto local, 112.8 por ciento.
					
					 El desembolso del presupuesto estatal se cumplio en 99.8 por ciento.
					
					 Enormes fondos fueron asignados al desarrollo de la economia nacional, de modo que garantizaran en lo financiero los proyectos para elevar el nivel autoctono y modernizar las industrias claves, incluso la industria ligera y la agricultura y 4 sectores avanzados de la economia nacional, y levantar creaciones monumentales dedicadas al centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Suficientes fondos fueron desembolsados para la implementacion de las politicas populares y socioculturales que corroboran la superioridad del regimen socialista coreano.
					
					 De esta manera, esas sumas contribuyeron al aseguramiento de la ensenanza general obligatoria gratuita, la asistencia medica gratuita, el seguro social, la jubilacion, el reposo y otras politicas sociales y al desarrollo vertiginoso de los deportes y la cultura de la era del Songun. 
					
					 El 15.8 por ciento del monto de presupuestos estatales egresados fue utilizado como gastos de defensa nacional.
					
					 El presupuesto estatal para 2012 establece la dimension de ingresos y egresos en el principio de garantizar en lo financiero la ofensiva general para materializar la estrategia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea por la prosperidad, de acuerdo con la demanda de la gran marcha en los albores de la nueva centuria de la Corea de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 El plan de ingresos crecera 8.7 por ciento en comparacion con el ano pasado.
					
					 Se preve un incremento de 7.5 por ciento en el ingreso proveniente de transacciones, fuente principal de los ingresos.
					
					 Segun el plan, las ganancias de las empresas estatales y de las entidades cooperativas registraran un exceso de 10.7 y 5.3 por ciento, respectivamente.
					
					 El fondo de amortizacion de bienes fijos crecera a 102.3 por ciento y las rentas provenientes del uso de bienes inmuebles y del seguro social llegaran a 101.9 y 101.7 por ciento, respectivamente.
					
					 El plan de egresos tendra un aumento de 10.1 por ciento con respecto al ano pasado. Entre ellos, las inversiones creceran a 109.4 en el dominio de industria ligera y agricultura, 112.1 por ciento en la industria electrica, la carbonifera, la metalurgica y el transporte ferroviario, 112.2 por ciento en las construcciones basicas, 110.9 por ciento en el desarrollo de la ciencia y tecnica, 109.2 por ciento en la educacion, 108.9 por ciento en la salud publica, 107 por ciento en los seguros sociales y la jubilacion, 106.9 por ciento en los deportes, y 106.8 por ciento en la rama de cultura. 
					
					 Se destinara a la defensa nacional el 15.8 por ciento del valor total de los egresos y se enviara mucho dinero este ano tambien a los hijos de los coreanos residentes en Japon a titulo de subsidios escolares y becas.
					
					 El diputado Choe enfatizo que todos los sectores y unidades de la economia nacional deben registrar constante auge en la produccion y construccion mediante la conquista de las tecnologias de punta en el fragor de la llamarada de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo, las de Hamnam (provincia de Hamgyong del Sur).
					
					 Al materializar cabalmente la orientacion del PTC de producir y ahorrar al maximo para que se cumplan consecuentemente los planes mensuales y trimestrales de ingresos presupuestarios, dijo.
					
					 Tenemos enormes tareas que cumplir, pero es definitiva la victoria gracias a la sabia guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, al solido fundamento de la economia independiente sentado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y al inagotable poderio espiritual de los militares y civiles unidos monoliticamente, concluyo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia subsidios escolares y becas a Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia subsidios escolares y becas a Chongryon
 Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) los subsidios escolares y becas equivalentes a 165 millones 600 mil \ (moneda japonesa) para la educacion nacional democratica de los hijos de los coreanos radicados en Japon.
					 El monto de tales fondos, enviados en 158 ocasiones hasta la fecha por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, llega a 46 mil 925 millones 50 mil 390 \.
